amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a review and submit a report on energy production in the United States and the effects of crude oil exports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2982 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 29. Record Vote Number: 8.

action.text: Amendment SA 2982 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S245-247; text: CR S246) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a review and submit a report on energy production in the United States and the effects of crude oil exports.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2982 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 29. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2982 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 29. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2982 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2953.
